Description: Red pottery bowl with circular foot, rounded lower-body and slightly concave cylindrical upper-body, incomplete and partially reconstructed.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 213)
Rzeuska 2017 / Chronological Overview of Pottery from Asyut (366-367) (Catalogue number 255)
